marklogic.body:
MOO', COUSIN SOLYNDRA AND MAXINE WA'TAHS CROWDED AROUN' THE 'TEE VEE'
President Obama (on air, sandwiched between the teleprompters): "I NEED YOUR HELP!" Cousin Solyndra: (She's shaking with emotiion) "Oh yes...yes, yes, yes, yes!" Moo': "Shut up fool....I know he's gonna mess up...shhhhhh! President Obama: "I know bblacks have suffered mightily because of the recession..." Maxine: "Oh lord YES! Say it brotha....(she falls to the floor) Moo' (to Cousin Solyndra as they both look at Maxine who is convulsing): "What in the h...???" President Obama: "...And so many people in this city are fighting us every step of the way." Cousin Solyndra: "...Yep! Those dang Republican's. They up our behinds, stingy bas....!" Moo': "Shhhhh....I know he gonna mess up. That's a good one though, about the Republicans. KICK 'EM BABY!" President Obama: " blacks know all too well from the civil rights struggle that the fight for what is right is never easy...no sir, it ain't eaaaaaaasy! Ya' hearin' me? DO YOU LOVE ME" (Crowd explodes in ) Cousin Solyndra: "Ooooooooo, he heatin' up now. SAY IT!" Moo' (frowning, waiting 'fa the otha shoe ta' drop) "Solyndra, so hep' me, if you don't shut up I'm gonna slap ya sillly....go throw a Cold beer on Maxine....she look dead!" Cousin Solyndra (looks down) "No, she looked that way when she got here." President Obama: "...So take your bedroom slippers! Moo' (she drops her taco,mid bite) "Wha...you can't.........TAKE YA' BED ROOM SLIPPERS What the f.....!" Maxine: (She comes to, hearing the sound of a lathered up 'rant') "Wha....take ya' whut?" Cousin Solyndra: (raised voice to the foggy Maxine) "Take your bedroom slippers!" Maxine (confused, looking down) "What the h e 1 1 you talking 'bout? I ain't got on any..." Moo' (to both) 'SHUT UP!" President Obama: " Put on your marching shoes.... Shake it . Stop complainin'. Stop grumblin'. Stop cryin'. We are going to press on. We have work to do." Moo' "No...NO! Not the wiggah stuff! He doin the wiggah stuff. Shee...yit! That dunce...." Maxine: "You go baby....tell 'em all to go straight ta' h e 1 1 !" Cousin Solyndra: "Hush, Maxi, baby....he talkin' ta our people....not whitie! Maybe ya' bettah lay the juice." Maxine: (centering her wig on her head) "Yah....well they can go straight ta' h e 1 1 too....everybody can go straight to..." Moo': "I knew it. I knew he'd mess up. House slippers! He might as well a told 'em ta' stop rollin' they eyes, put down the drumstick, watermelon and come on down outta the tree's! (She begins to leave the room). Cousin Solyndra: "Where you to...Shake Shack?" Moo': "H e 1 1 no....I'm gonna start packin' AGAIN'. Pack, unpack...pack, unpack. No wonder I'm Always hungry." (They all exit with Maxine first bumping into the door frame...."And YOU can go straight to...oh, excuse me. You a door!)
Tight shot of the President: "Don'cha just love me?!"
